title: Replace the Substring for Balanced String
content:
You are given a string containing only 4 kinds of characters   and .
A string is said to be balanced if each of its characters appears  times where  is the length of the string.
Return the minimum length of the substring that can be replaced with any other string of the same length to make the original string  balanced.
Return 0 if the string is already balanced.
 








 



 is a multiple of 4
contains only , ,  and .
